pullrequest.title: Make sure gzserver destroys all callbacks when gzclient exits

content.raw: The main issue was that the list of callbacks in `Publication` was not properly cleared after a gzclient exited. So, I would recommend launching a gzserver and monitor the list of `Publication::callbacks` when one or several gzclients are launched and after they exit.
